description: Skip the luggage carousel with this carry-on size pack. It meets most carry-on restrictions and holds 3 to 5 days worth of clothes. Carry it over your shoulder or briefcase-style. Use the hidden shoulder straps for walking or for riding your rental Vespa.Fabric is abrasion resistant 630-denier nylon with a polyurethane coating and a DWR finish.Lining is polyester with a DWR finish.Main compartment zips open book-style with a U-zip that wraps around 3 sides.Floating divider in the main compartment separates clean and dirty clothes and compresses stuff in place.External zippered pockets for access to travel documents, wallet, phone and other essentials.Dual daisy chains allow you to attach extra gear or strap the bag to a roof rack.Meets most carry-on size restrictions (check with your carrier for their specific restrictions).
name: Patagonia Tres MLC 45L - Unisex
